plot: A cardiologist's worst nightmare comes true when he goes under the knife for heart bypass surgery and experiences "awareness during surgery", a terrifying condition that leaves a patient conscious but paralyzed during the operation.
title: Under
plot_es: A cardiologist's worst nightmare comes true when he goes under the knife for heart bypass surgery and experiences "awareness during surgery", a terrifying condition that leaves a patient conscious but paralyzed during the operation.
plot_en: A cardiologist's worst nightmare comes true when he goes under the knife for heart bypass surgery and experiences "awareness during surgery", a terrifying condition that leaves a patient conscious but paralyzed during the operation.
